author: Robert Morris
releaseNotes:
Version 3.1.3: Fix for scenes using CoCoHue 5.1+ scene devices.

Version 3.1.1: Fix for dim step setting being ignored

Version 3.1: Add ability to use hub variable for level; added optional command metering preference.

Version 3.0.1: Fix for error in UI that may appear when dimmers do not support ChangeLevel capability.

Version 3.0: New child app version 3. See forum for more details. Ability to mix different actions for same button event and additional enhacements.

Version 2.1.3: Fix for "togggle" option not showing with only single dimmer selected

Version 2.1.2: Minor bugfix for display name of press/action numbers greater than 9.

Note: Version 2 is a major upgrade and is not directly upgradeable from version 1. Version 1 users should consult the Community thread for manual upgrade instructions.
